title: Spiritual Discernment Seminar
description: A powerful one-day seminar to help believers cultivate sensitivity to the voice of God, discern spirits, and walk in spiritual authority.

title: Leadership and Church Governance
description: Equipping current and aspiring church leaders with biblical and administrative tools to effectively govern the body of Christ.

title: The Prayer Life of a Believer
description: Explore the foundational principles and practices of building a vibrant and effective personal prayer life.

title: Marriage & Purpose Alignment
description: A seminar designed for couples and singles to understand God's design for marriage and how to align with divine purpose together.

title: Youth & Identity in Christ
description: A transformational session for youth to discover their identity in Christ, spiritual gifts, and kingdom purpose.

title: Deliverance and Inner Healing
description: Learn the biblical foundations and practical tools for deliverance ministry and emotional healing for leaders and prayer teams.
